name: Crater Invaders!
description:
The year is 2071 and the first international space base has been constructed inside of a crater on Mars. It is fully self-sufficient and seemingly safe and secure until suddenly, monstrous invaders appear to pillage the base's resources and destroy its inhabitants. You and your comrades are surviving, but without conventional weapons of any kind in the base, you must scavenge for alien parts in order to fight back!

You must:

  1. Find the right weapon to damage the various enemy types
  2. Find the bomb to destroy the enemy portal generator
  3. TRUST your comrades to defend you while you deliver the bomb

To win the game, one of you must find the bomb and deliver it to the enemy portal generator. The generator is outside the crater. Once you place the bomb, it will detonate and destroy all enemy invaders.

Controls: WASD, Space.
